title:
Enterprise Business Studies can anybody jus tell about this course and what its grading policy is
TIA

comments.body:
I didnt take EBS but heard its prettty simple and straightforward their isa's are mad easy and even esa is pretty easy it's not very much code based, they do teach SAP which is the heart of erp  
so yea its pretty much very easy to score a A or S in this course  
Also its pretty relavant cuz erp is always gonna exist and there's a big market for ai integration with it
